text: North Carolina Agricultural and Technical State University (abbreviated to NC A&T; or A&T;) is a university located in Greensboro, North Carolina, United States of America. The current chancellor of North Carolina Agricultural and Technical State University is Harold L. Martin Senior. ==References== Category:Colleges and universities in North Carolina Category:Greensboro, North Carolina Category:Historically black colleges and universities
title: North Carolina Agricultural and Technical State University
